00011     AccessFlags = NULL;

00016     hSegMemFile = NULL;
00017 #else

00028 #ifndef WIN32 // for linux and OS X
00029 bool SharedMemSegment::RemoveSharedMemSegment( unsigned int SegtKey )
00030 {
00031     struct shmid_ds SharedMemInfos;
00032     int iSharedMem;
00033
00034     // Check if we get information about it
00035     iSharedMem = shmget( SegtKey, 0, 0 );
00036     if ( iSharedMem == -1 || shmctl( iSharedMem, IPC_STAT, &SharedMemInfos ) == -1 )
00037     {
00038         return false;
00039     }
00040
00041     // Is it freeable ?
00042     if ( SharedMemInfos.shm_nattch == 0 )
00043     {
00044         // Try to remove it
00045         return (shmctl( iSharedMem, IPC_RMID, (struct shmid_ds*)NULL ) != -1 );
00046     }
00047
00048     return false;
00049 }
00050 #endif

00052 void SharedMemSegment::SetName( unsigned int SegKey )
00053 {
00054     TemporaryMemoryBuffer Tmpc(32);
00055
00056     // Store key
00057     SegmentKey = SegKey;
00058
00059 #ifdef WIN32
00060     // Create a Name for this segment
00061     Name = "Global\\OMiSCID_";
00062     sprintf( Tmpc, "%8.8x", SegKey );
00063     Name += Tmpc;
00064 #else
00065     Name = (key_t)SegKey;
00066 #endif
00067 }
00068
00069 void SharedMemSegment::InitNewSharedMemSegment( bool GrantWriteAccess )
00070 {
00071     AccessFlags = (SharedMemSegmentFlags*)SegAddress;
00072     UserAddress = ((char*)SegAddress)+GetSizeOfReservedSpace();
00073
00074     // Is it possible to write in it ?
00075     if ( GrantWriteAccess == false )
00076     {
00077         // If not, say it !
00078         *AccessFlags = (SharedMemSegmentFlags)(*AccessFlags | SharedMemSegment_ReadOnly);
00079     }
00080
00081     // Ok, the memory segment is initialized
00082     *AccessFlags = (SharedMemSegmentFlags)(*AccessFlags | SharedMemSegment_Initialized);
00083 }
00084
00085 bool SharedMemSegment::GetSharedMemSegmentAccess( bool WantWriteAccess )
00086 {
00087     AccessFlags = (SharedMemSegmentFlags*)SegAddress;
00088     UserAddress = ((char*)SegAddress)+GetSizeOfReservedSpace();
00089
00090     if ( WantWriteAccess == true )
00091     {
00092         // We wait for the SegMem to be initialized
00093         // No need to use a mutex as there is only one producer and many consumers
00094         int NbTry;
00095         for( NbTry = 0; NbTry < 10; NbTry++ )
00096         {
00097             if ( ((*AccessFlags) & SharedMemSegment_Initialized ) )
00098             {
00099                 break;
00100             }
00101             Thread::Sleep(10);
00102         }
00103         if ( NbTry == 10 )
00104         {
00105             OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x (too long to initialize).\n", SegmentKey );
00106             Close();
00107             return false;
00108         }
00109
00110         if ( ((*AccessFlags) & SharedMemSegment_ReadOnly) )
00111         {
00112             OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x with write access.\n", SegmentKey );
00113             Close();
00114             return false;
00115         }
00116     }
00117
00118     return true;
00119 }
00120
00121 bool SharedMemSegment::CreateAndOpen( unsigned int SegKey, int SegmentSize, bool GrantWriteAccessToOthers /* = false */ )
00122 {
00123     int TotalSize;
00124
00125     if ( SegKey == 0 || SegmentSize == 0 )
00126     {
00127         throw SimpleException("SharedMemSegment::CreateAndOpen bad parameter(s)", 0);
00128     }
00129
00130     // Set name of this segment
00131     SetName( SegKey );
00132
00133     // Compute TotalSize of the segment (including all data).
00134     TotalSize = SegmentSize + GetSizeOfReservedSpace();
00135
00136 #ifdef WIN32
00137     // Create a map file call Name
00138     hSegMemFile = CreateFileMapping(INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE,0,PAGE_READWRITE,0,(DWORD)TotalSize,Name.GetStr());
00139     if ( hSegMemFile == 0 )
00140     {
00141         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x\n", SegKey );
00142         return false;
00143     }
00144     // Get adress of the shared memory segment
00145     SegAddress = (void*)MapViewOfFile( hSegMemFile, FILE_MAP_READ | FILE_MAP_WRITE, 0, 0, 0 );
00146     if ( SegAddress == NULL )
00147     {
00148         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x (no access)\n", SegKey );
00149         Close();
00150         return false;
00151     }
00152 #else
00153     OmiscidTrace( "%d\n", Name );
00154     // Create new segment or fail
00155     iSegMem = shmget( Name, TotalSize, IPC_CREAT | IPC_EXCL | 0666 );
00156     if ( iSegMem == -1 )
00157     {
00158         // Try to remove it
00159         if ( RemoveSharedMemSegment( Name ) == false || (iSegMem = shmget( Name, TotalSize, IPC_CREAT | IPC_EXCL | 0666 )) == -1 )
00160         {
00161             OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x\n", SegKey );
00162             return false;
00163         }
00164     }
00165     // Get address of the segment
00166     SegAddress = (void *)shmat( iSegMem, 0, 0 );
00167     if ( SegAddress == NULL )
00168     {
00169         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x (no access)\n", SegKey );
00170         Close();
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173
00174 #endif // WIN32
00175 
00176     // Here we have the Segment, so prepare it
00177     InitNewSharedMemSegment( GrantWriteAccessToOthers );
00178
00179     return true;
00180 }
00181
00182 bool SharedMemSegment::Open( unsigned int SegKey, bool ReadAndWriteAccess /* = false */ )
00183 {
00184     // Set name of this segment
00185     SetName( SegKey );
00186
00187 #ifdef WIN32
00188 
00189     // Open the file map
00190     hSegMemFile = OpenFileMapping( FILE_MAP_READ | FILE_MAP_WRITE, FALSE, Name.GetStr() );
00191     if ( hSegMemFile == 0 )
00192     {
00193         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x\n", SegKey );
00194         return false;
00195     }
00196
00197     DWORD DesiredAccess = FILE_MAP_READ;
00198     // Do we want also a write access
00199     if ( ReadAndWriteAccess == true )
00200     {
00201         DesiredAccess |= FILE_MAP_WRITE;
00202     }
00203
00204     // Get adress of the shared memory segment
00205     // We will check later if we have realy access
00206     SegAddress = (void*)MapViewOfFile( hSegMemFile, DesiredAccess, 0, 0, 0 );
00207     if ( SegAddress == NULL )
00208     {
00209         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x (no access)\n", SegKey );
00210         Close();
00211         return false;
00212     }
00213 #else
00214     // open a previously created shared segment or fail
00215     iSegMem = shmget( Name, 0, 0 );
00216     if ( iSegMem == -1 )
00217     {
00218         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x\n", SegKey );
00219         return false;
00220     }
00221
00222     int DesiredAccess;
00223     // Do we want also a write access
00224     if ( ReadAndWriteAccess == false )
00225     {
00226         DesiredAccess = SHM_RDONLY;
00227     }
00228     else
00229     {
00230         DesiredAccess = 0;
00231     }
00232
00233     // Get address of the segment
00234     SegAddress = (void *)shmat( iSegMem, 0, DesiredAccess );
00235     if ( SegAddress == NULL )
00236     {
00237         OmiscidTrace( "Could not open segment %8.8x (no access)\n", SegKey );
00238         Close();
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241 #endif // WIN32
00242 
00243     // Here we have the Segment, so prepare it
00244     return GetSharedMemSegmentAccess( ReadAndWriteAccess );
00245 }
00246
00247 void SharedMemSegment::Close()
00248 {
00249     // Free ressources
00250 #ifdef WIN32
00251     if ( SegAddress != NULL )
00252     {
00253         UnmapViewOfFile( SegAddress );
00254     }
00255     if ( hSegMemFile != NULL )
00256     {
00257         CloseHandle( hSegMemFile );
00258     }
00259 #else
00260     // Say to the system that this share can be destroy
00261     // if no one is using it
00262     if ( iSegMem != -1 )
00263     {
00264         shmctl(iSegMem, IPC_RMID, NULL );
00265     }
00266     if ( SegAddress != NULL )
00267     {
00268         shmdt( SegAddress );
00269     }
00270 #endif // WIN32
00271 
00272     // Unset members
00273     SegmentKey  = 0;
00274     SegAddress  = NULL;
00275     AccessFlags = NULL;
00276     UserAddress = NULL;
00277
00278 #ifdef WIN32
00279     Name.Empty();
00280     hSegMemFile = NULL;
00281 #else
00282     Name        = (key_t)0;
00283     iSegMem = -1;
00284 #endif
00285 }
